## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                     | Type                              | Default    |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`    | `size`    | How large should the button be? | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"`  | `"medium"` |
| `variant` | `variant` | What type of button is this?    | `"danger" \| "info" \| "success"` | `"info"`   |
